1. Retrieve the page using a content query or use the new content retriever API. 2. Make sure there result is not null or empty.
Also, why are you using `GetAwaiter().GetResult()` inside a View Component? `GetAwaiter().GetResult()` is only an escape hatch meant to be used when you have to write async code inside a synchronous method. The View Component's `InvokeAsync()` is not synchronous, which means you should be using `async` and `await`.
